indexedCategory.name: DummyClockConfig.
indexedCategory.toolTip: Clock configurations for different run modes

choiceOption.name: mcg_c7_oscsel.
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the MCG FLL/PLL external reference clock source

binaryOption.name: mcg_c8_cme1.
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if the clock monitor is enabled for the RTC external clock.\n CME1 bit must be set to a logic 0 before the MCG enters any Stop mode

binaryOption.name: mcg_c8_locre1.
binaryOption.description: OSC1 (RTC) Loss of Clock Reset Enable
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if a interrupt or a reset request is made following a loss of RTC external reference clock.\n Only has an affect when CME1 is set.

binaryOption.name: ERRATA_E2448
binaryOption.description: Flash prefetch could result in incorrect read data
binaryOption.toolTip: Issue: Flash prefetch could result in incorrect read data when CLKDIV1 changed\n Workaround: Use code in RAM that disables/restores prefetch around changing CLKDIV1

binaryOption.name: ERRATA_E7993
binaryOption.toolTip: Issue: FLL frequency may be incorrect after changing the FLL reference clock\n Workaround: Invert MCG_C4[DMX32] before clock source changes and restore afterwards
